snippet: Senator Rand Paul’s advertising team is embracing the “TrueView” technology, the first political campaign hoping to use the “skip” button quirk to its advantage.
abstract: Senator Rand Paul’s advertising team is embracing the “TrueView” technology, the first political campaign hoping to use the “skip” button quirk to its advantage.

headline.main: In Rand Paul Ads, an Appeal to Viewers Before the ‘Skip This’
